mapper.update: update clock set serial_no = #{serialNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, clock_name = #{clockName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, colock_id = #{colockId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, x = #{x,jdbcType=REAL}, y = #{y,jdbcType=REAL}, z = #{z,jdbcType=REAL}, ip = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mac = #{mac,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `online` = #{online,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `enable` = #{enable,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, serial_no, clock_name, colock_id, x, y, z, ip, mac, `online`, `enable` from clock
select id, serial_no, clock_name, colock_id, x, y, z, ip, mac, `online`, `enable` from clock where clock_name like concat('%',#{clock_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
